product_name: Planet Bike Superflash Micro USB Rear Bike Light
long_description: Enhancing rear visibility with an improved flashing mode that's even visible in the daylight, the compact Superflash Micro USB Rear Bike Light can be charged at any computer with a USB port. Includes high and low power beams and the steady and attention-grabbing Super Flash(TM) flashing mode. Includes bike mounts and clip mount for multiple mounting options. Distinct flash pattern indicates when the battery is getting low. Soft-touch power switch accesses flashing or steady mode. Mini USB charging cable is included.
short_description: Enhancing rear visibility with an improved flashing mode that's even visible in the daylight, the compact Superflash Micro USB Rear Bike Light can be charged at any computer with a USB port.
